revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edge-corE |model=ECG9210 |revision=-04 |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/01/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=HEDECG9210 |ic_id= |us_id=1KRDL04BECG9210 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ikanos |cpu1_model=IKF6850;IKF6850-A0-LB1-L; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S28D40ETP-G5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2417;AR2417-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175D |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=VDSL2,ADSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ECG9210-04_AP-0 |default_ssid_regex=^ECG9210-04_AP-0$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Home Gateway VDSL2 Router}} :with 802.11b/g capabilities
Per FCC photos, this device is using... *an ''[[Ikanos]]'' IKF6850 (IKF6850-A0-LB1-L) SoC :w/ FXS50IF1-03-A1-QE1-L and FXS50LD1-03-A1-QL1-L *an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR2417-AL1A (Wi-Fi IC)
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
